data.title: Good wine, fune place
data.text: Excellent selection of wines by the glass that changes offerings. GOod selection of bar offering but better because you can order from the great Pizza/Italian restraunt next door. MUsic many nights.

data.title: Relaxing and tasty
data.text:
Traveled to Tony's Brick Oven which is next door only to find it full with a wait.  I then found that the business next door had no wait and used the same kitchen, which was Sea Grapes.  
We were greeted quickly and the order was also taken without hesitation.  The appetizer (fried mozzarella) arrived quickly and was very good.  My daughter had a meatball sub, which was good however the bread was burned on a quarter of the sandwich, but they did offer to replace it however they should have noticed before sending it out.  The pizza was hot and tasty but had to be sent back because one of the toppings was missing from one side of the pizza.  The order was a little confusing having one topping only on half and the other covering the entire pizza, but it was fixed quickly.  No glass ever ran dry during our visit and the bathrooms were clean.

The entire restaurant had a nice vibe and was also very clean.

I will return for drinks next time for it is a wine bar.

data.title: Classy
data.text:
The pizza place next door was packed so the owner sent us to the Sea Grapes.  Great Decor for an old classic downtown area.  Specialty high end drinks, no call drinks here.  Appetizers are recommended for pairing with drinks.  Efficient, courteous staff.  The physical space is limited.
Great entertainment for adults who like jazz/blues music.
One can place orders off the menu from the next door pizzeria, but no gluten free crusts.  If you are hungry, you will leave fully satisfied.  Our friends split one pizza with salad - three ways!  I had grilled fish that was fabulous.  Sea Grapes not for children.

data.title: Choices
data.text: The staff at Sea Grapes is knowledgeable and friendly.  To an oenophile the former is essential.  Excellent choice of wines which are well-priced, although the selections tend to be of screwcap lower-cost vintages.

data.title: Nice Atmosphere
data.text: We just had a flight of wines, no food this visit.They had a limited menu, but interesting. We had a very nice server.

data.title: Wine Bar
data.text: Great wine bar and you can order from the pizza place next door. Wine and Cheese Plate and glass of wine for under $12 good selection of wine and great attentive customer service!

data.title: Not that impressed.
data.text: Wine price and pours are not standard. Great atmosphere. Maybe good place to impress a date. But not a place I will return to.

data.title: One of a Kind
data.text: If you enjoy fine wines, don't leave town without visiting Beth and Tony at Sea Grapes.  They have a light fare menu, or order something from their brick oven.  You will not be disappointed.

data.title: Go here for happy hour special
data.text: Sea grapes is a wine bar – or a wine-sampling bar.  At happy hour you get 3 generous1-ounce pours for $3.50.  Sweet deal.  We enjoyed the wine selection – leading us to stay [and drink] more than we had planned.  We recommend you stop in between 4 and 6.

data.title: Winos request.
data.text: This is a great place. Good atmosphere and good service. A few more food menus would make me give it an excellent!

data.title: I love wine!
data.text: We went here on Saturday night around 7:00pm to try everything out. The atmosphere is very relaxed and dim lit. We ordered a bottle of wine for 3 of us, another got a glass on her own. We had the cheese and fruit plate as an appetizer which was plenty for 4. We also ordered the Downtown Supreme pizza. It was fantastic! Sea Grapes has a small menu on the table. They will bring you the full menu from Tony's Pizzeria, which is the kitchen for Sea Grapes. We did not have dessert because we were pretty full from out meal. There was a man playing music, which was very low when we first got there, but as our meal progressed, so did the volume of his speaker. We could barely hear each other by the time we left. Overall, we had a nice meal and good wine.

data.title: Excellent little wine bar
data.text: My friends and I wanted to try some different types of wines so we went to the Sea Grapes Wine Bar. You can choose a white flight-choice of three white wines to taste or a red flight-choice of three red wines. You can also choose to sample any of their wines before you decide on the wine you would like to drink. They also have food to pair with the wines. It is a very relaxed setting that you can enjoy with friends. They have live music at night and Latin dance lessons upstairs!
